roleset.name: practice
roleset.note: PRACTICE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'practice' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'play'. (from practice.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: odd kind of instrument
example.text: Yet even today, institutions are quietly practicing forms of portfolio insurance by nervously rushing to and fro in the markets.
example.arg: by nervously rushing to and fro in the markets

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Chinese people emphasize the difference between statesmanship and hegemony , believing in the philosophy that a government which employs benevolence " will please those near and appeal to those from afar , " and " when those from afar will not submit , then one must practice kindness and virtue to attract them . "
example.arg: when those from afar will not submit

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: But many owners plan to practice frugality -- crossing out the old code and writing in the new one until their stock runs out .
example.arg: crossing out the old code and writing in the new one
